bow: this handsome dude turned on friday had his birthday party today and no other kids showed up and feeling pretty down about it he does seem to mind but as mom feeling pretty hurt aw that sucks happy birthday to your little cutie hang in there momma and celebrate this is just my worst nightmare but so pleased he not upset you did your bit and he ok and that what matters would definitely be having little cry though so afraid of this don even host parties so you re already doing better than me wtf are those parents doing with their children at that age kids aren mean like that we had the cake and did the presents nana and poppop were there my in laws we video chatted with grandma suzy my mom we are going to bring all the cupcakes we made to daycare tomorrow he enjoying all his new toys and clothes and is now taking nap after his sugar high wore off lol thinking about taking him mini golfing this afternoon for something new and fun well at least the people that love him made it special but get it totally be hurt for my child thats why we typically take ours on mini vacation happy birthday little dude it sounds like he still had great time which is what counts this happened to my son at his 3rd birthday as well feel your pain he so loved by you and your family that what matters my son is now and has had two wonderful birthday parties hope the years coming are better for your son and you as well only have families not close basically acquaintences could invite to my guys 3rd next month so not having party for him because sure be in the same situation it breaks my heart we do really have any friends hopefully it will be better next year ca believe not having party for him feeling for you aw that heartbreaking as mom my son is turning next month hope his friends come an rsvp means nothing to lot of people these days it so much easier to send text cancelling arrangements than it is to actually organise your time to do what you said you were going to do obviously sometimes there are actual circumstances that make last minute cancellation or no show unavoidable life happens especially with kids but the fact that people just plain suck accounts for lot of this trend of guestless parties in my day feeling hundred years old if you said you were coming to party you damn well went unless you were bleeding profusely or vomiting keeping your word is important doubly so when it someone birthday to clarify this picture is from friday on his actual birthday when we took him to the kids museum which is why there are kids in the background was doing video during cake and presents today so did have one to post from today that sucks but at the very least he happy and seems to have had blast with those who love him don let this overshadow the fact that he you ve had this special little man in your live and in your arms for years now happy belated 3rd birthday that smile melts my heart if you check out this sub and parenting its pretty common problem it turned me into an amateur stalker leading up to birthday parties like you want to be chill but you also want to text every rsvp one week 48 hours and hours before the party to check that the guest list is stable already have anxiety over hosting events so this new world of no shows is definitely giving me an ulcer my sister has big close knit in laws she married into and they all live in the same area they pack the house every time she does it up big 2nd day party had almost 30 people and no everyone showed face paint bounce house everything my husband and do activities with our yr old but we moved to place where we don know lot of people we re pretty inclusive and we plan on doing family party each year and may be an activity for her birthday when she makes friends in the future but every one has their own thing don know that ll ever get to do the big birthday thing with her but trying not to set it up so that she experiences this glad he had good time it happened to me once when was and still remember being devastated good luck to all us out there that just want them to have happy fun birthdays feel your pain same thing happened to my son on his 5th birthday totally heart breaking had few of my daughters friends show up and he had blast now whenever planning birthday party have major panic attacks double and triple check to see who is coming sorry as parent that does hurt but remember at his most important people were there worry about this with my kids because the only kids we have in our lives are three of my friends kids we have very small family so no cousins for them and they only go to school once week so don know any of the parents if my three friends bail we would have no kids either did find out the guests were coming until hour after the party had started removed few things break my heart more than the thought of birthday party no one shows up to especially when it for little kid that happened to me as teenager once or twice and it killed me finally stopped having birthday parties and just started asking my parents to take me to dinner or something but make damn sure to go to other people events unless really sick or something because do want other people to go through that it sucks but it really is personal usually most of the time people are trying to slight you life just happens and people overbook or do plan ahead on related note so many people in this thread sound so stressed and birthday parties should be like that if you are tense and worried your kid will pick up on that and it wo be enjoyable for anyone my suggestion is not to do party at all if it legitimately makes you anxious take your kid to movie or their favorite restaurant or just do something intimate with the immediate family or put it in someone else hands my mil threw my son 2nd birthday party this year and yes ton of people were no shows and it was mostly just family but my son did care he had blast not everyone is party planner and that totally fine do let pinterest moms make you feel pressured if it just not your jam as long as your kid feels special and loved that what matters most if they are old enough to ask for party then that one thing but at this age they really wo know it not just another day much love to your little boy op he looks happy if it makes you feel better never forgot the birthday party where none of my friends showed up im happy to know that at least you had family there and he had good time people suck because petty af if it were children from the daycare invited would not bring the cupcakes there it was children from daycare but we are going to eat all the cupcakes ourselves so rather they not go to waste oh honey he not going to notice or care my son third birthday we got him birthday parties down the road for my daughter people suck hey do beat yourself up your kiddo will probably never notice or remember that he did have 3rd birthday party that is important what is important is that everyday he wakes up in loving home with loving family even if it just you two you are loving family and goes to bed with the same your son and op both seem to have so much love in their lives they do notice the social expectations that we are we because cried little reading this story and your response tbh concerned and hurting over on their behalf you are both strong wonderful parents and your sons will grow up insulated from this stuff by your love removed mine is 3yo girl she loves paw patrol and no one came to her party last uear so this year were keeping it to family dinner we would have totally came to see your kiddo happy birthday ve found it better as the kids age as the kid is more into going my daughter is now and omg she knows everyone birthday and where the party is ect we couldn miss one with out full on melt down selfishly bc hate no shows encourage my daughter to confirm with her friends aka they then remind their parents it true people are crappy we missed one party bc she threw up the morning of yep not going dropped the gift off at their house and said we were sorry almost missed second as my daughter was sick on tuesday party was friday let the mom know on tuesday we were experiencing some kind of stomach bug and that if she felt more comfortable with us not attending it would be fine luckily she was better by friday and the mom said not to worry as of course the kids are together all day at school during the incubation period and have already been exposed it as you point out about communication we didn have party with friends until my daughter was and was finally asking for party as she been invited to some at daycare 1st birthday was fun party with lots of family and few of our adult friends some of whom had kids second amp third birthdays were just some cake at home and your choice for dinner if had to guess ate mac and cheese or mcdonald have year old who totally looks like your boy if we lived in the same area they totally be friends and we would never do no show so sorry that happened to you it sounds like you were able to turn things around and make it fun day for him though good job mom don know why people are so flaky where live people don really have birthday parties with friends for young kids but have experienced people flaking from other things an introvert too so can understand how social events might sound fun far in advance but painful the day of but also trying to teach my kids that it important to keep commitments and promises so if said we be there we ll be there barring contagious illnesses or some other dire situation it not the kids fault their parents didn take them to the party they re first time mom to an almost month old so not experiencing parent kid politics yet but came here to say your boy is beautiful and looks to be happy boo good job momma think it so fun to just spend the party money on special experience for the family we do trips to the kids museum or aquarium something really fun and they do know or care that typically year olds would be having party no one wants to go to year olds party not the parents and not the kids don feel hurt just let it be what it is something all parents feel they have want to do but then after few years they realize it isn year olds don care about anyone but their family stop feeling hurt say this from experience
